snippet.title: Escape From Sandhill Steam Launch Announcement
snippet.description:
Welcome to Sandhill, where survival lurks in the shadows. You awaken in darkness, disoriented, with only the distant echoes of alarms and the dim beam of a flashlight to guide you. Armed with nothing but your wits, you must navigate the treacherous, haunting corridors of Sandhill’s forgotten tunnels—each corner harboring secrets and the tormented shadows of those who fell victim to gruesome experiments.

In this atmospheric horror adventure, every step is a new puzzle, every shadow a potential threat. Unravel the mysteries hidden within these depths, piece together clues, and follow the message from an old friend, who may hold the key to your escape—or your doom. But beware: the darkness is alive, and it remembers.

Get it on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3342630/Escape_From_Sandhill/
